resources.string: This quiz is designed to test your knowledge regarding U.S. State Capitals. Each quiz iteration tests your knowledge on the capitals of 6 randomly chosen U.S. States, with 2 questions given per state for a total of 12 questions, and 12 possible points to score! For each pair, the first questions ask you to identify the capital of the given state, and the second questions ask if the capital of the given state is the most populous city in that state.
